item.title: Four Days Below with IC Caving Club
item.author: Tanguy Racine,
item.description: Hey ho! Silence. We know what it means. Cavers returning. The kettle lets out a hisssss and gurgles. A tackle bag falls heavily on the floor and we all look up. “Hey ho!” And conversations resume, “Yes this word fits”, “What about fifteen down ?”, “Does it go?”, “Tea is up!”, “Where’s the cow ?” I …
